website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive and powerful, available in 14 different colors and capable of carrying up to 260 pounds.
pros: One of the  cheapest hover boards available today, it still has great power with dual 300-watt hub motors and a quick recharge
It looks great and comes with LED running lights and Bluetooth speakers
cons: The tires are a bit small, only 6.5 inches in diameter
Larger tires would deliver a smoother ride

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for your kids!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t leave reviews very often but this scooter worth my time. It is a high quality balance wheel. My 4-year old just practiced about 5 mins then she can enjoy the fun all by herself. We are so happy because she loves it! Pros: It is easy to play,fancy looking,reasonable price, high quality. Cons: not found yet
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son tried several hover boards, he loves this one best. It is stable, easy to control, and fancy. The battery lasts quite long. I highly recommend this one. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hefei Hu

customer_reviews.title: Great option for the price
customer_reviews.text: Researched many hover boards before selecting this one. Very happy with the purchase so far. It came well packaged and in a timely manner. Sharp design. Charged fully before first use. Daughter can ride 1-2 hours on full battery charge. Very satisfied with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Brigham

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoverboard for my 10 year old son as a gift. He absolutely loves it! Super user friendly nd product is made well. He loves hooking his Bluetooth up and riding around listening to his music. It's very entertaining seeing him roll around dancing and doing tricks on it. The battery lasts him all day. The carrying case it comes with is handy for when he takes it to his grandparents house. We love this hoverboard and so glad we chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: shailyn stricklen

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: my kids they love it so much, they have so much fun with it. love the function with bluetooth speaker that he can connect it and listening the music he like while he is playing. it good to ride 1-2 hours after full charge, when the battery get low the red light will warning you it low battery and making beep sound. led light are so cool when it on. they are so enjoy with their new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Nice hoverboard for kiddos but bad wall charger
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time. Bought as gift for my 9 year old's birthday gift. She was able to ride this like a pro after a few hours of practice. My 4 year old even learned to ride as well. Only thing I didn't like was the wall charger never turned green when the hoverboard is plugged in for charging even after 4 hours of continuous charging. Didn't want to over charge so unplugged it. The hoverboard does give about 30 to 40 mins of playtime before needing to recharge. I may have just gotten a bad wall charger. Overall would have been a 5 star. Would recommend this product but just watch your charging time to not over charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresan

customer_reviews.title: Autism Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 autistic children (5 & 7) that loves this device. They learned to ride it in minutes. They have only rode it in the house (tile floors). My two older children (14 & 16) also enjoys it. I may have to buy more because now they want to race each other. I do recommend this product at this time. I can’t speak on long term.
customer_reviews.author: SCoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice, Great Bluetooth feature
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hover board - the Bluetooth speaker pairs easily every time without an issue. The battery life seems to be good, although the kids plug it in after they use it, so it never has been an issue. Honestly, the only downside would be that the carrying bag that it comes with is kind of thin and cheaply made. Overall, I would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lpump

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 13 year old!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s 13th birthday. He loves it!! Learned balance very quickly. My 19 year old also uses it. Great present. Blue tooth is also great!!! Fast shipping. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good size for kids
customer_reviews.text: This size is fervent for 5 years. It is balance well. My son can ride by himself within 5 minutes the first time when he got it. He played it almost everyday after school. When he rides on road, neighbors keep asking and want to buy one. It is awesome hover board with beautiful light. The Bluetooth works good. It pairs easily without any issues every time. I am satisfied with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Defective after a week
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this hover board with his own money after the one he received for Christmas was a disappointment. This worked great out of the box and he loves the Bluetooth function and the carrying bag. However, after less than a week, the charging port pulled loose from the inside and we have loose wires hanging out. It won’t hold a charge, so he can’t ride or for more than 5 min. He is so disappointed! The company will issue a refund BUT we have to go to the trouble of shipping it back. My poor son is so sad to be without a working hover board. Maybe we just got a lemon, but beware.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Filapek

customer_reviews.title: Very cool.
customer_reviews.text: We like this hover board. The quality is so wonderful. I am getting this for my niece. She likes it so much. The led light on the wheels are so cool. And it can play music by connecting the bluetooth, that makes everything so much more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ty next.

customer_reviews.title: This did not dissapoint
customer_reviews.text: There are so many different hover boards out there. I wanted to get one that would have a good battery life. This one does. My daughter rides it in and out of the house. The wheels are solid and don't mark up my floors when we wipe them off from being outside. The lights are amazing on it. I would take a picture of it but it's in my daughters messy room. The wheels light up and there are head lights on the front of it. I got great value for my money and I bought this almost 5 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: joshyjosh00

customer_reviews.title: I love this hoverboard!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ten year old granddaughter an this is what she said: I LOVE THIS!!! The music feature is awesome, I can listen loudly while riding! The battery lasts a long time and the motions are swift and fast. The only thing I don’t like is the speed, I would Rather it to go faster without it beeping to slow down. On the instructions it says that it can go up to six miles an hour I think that’s wrong but I’m not sure. I love this hoverboard.
customer_reviews.author: karen Bolt

customer_reviews.title: They are fun and not as hard as it seems.
customer_reviews.text: Battery does not last longer than 30 minutes st a time . Exchanging mine for hopefully a better battery life.
customer_reviews.author: marie freeman

customer_reviews.title: Will not last long in, in all meaning of the term
customer_reviews.text: Received in June, now August, had to use the purchase protection plan because the manufacturer SISIGAD will not respond to email. You only have 30 days to return to the store, pretty much like a car warranty, at 36k miles everything starts to act up. Around the 35 day, the thing would not do a full charge. Followed the steps the store told me to reset the machine. Nothing. Now it wont even go up to 4mph. Charges in about 15 minutes (light changes to green on charger) and you ride for about 5 minutes before you have to walk back carrying your hoverboard. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: 1 out 2 working
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my kids. Immediately plugged them in and started charging. As instructed, I waited until the charger displayed green light. After a full charge, I turned them on. One turned on like it should. Second one didn't turn on. Interestingly, the second turns on when it is plugged in, but the charger stays green. When I unplug it, it doesn't turn on again... What a shame... waited like a month to get them delivered.... Judging by the working one, it's a good product, but I guess there are some bad apples in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son in may 2019 and road it 3 times and now it will not work. This product sucks never again will I get anything from Amazon.. !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good for the kids
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love them. Perfect for sub 60lbs riders. Above 115lbs and it gets sketch. Well below 154lbs, on the label. Only had for a day, so I can’t speak to its durability or battery life. So far so good. I’ll update if anything changes. DISAPPOINTING: the Amazon description says up to 9 mph. And riders up to 260lbs. Clearly misrepresented. But, I guess I should’ve known, because other more known brands for $100 more didn’t have high specs either.
customer_reviews.author: Nonze

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! I purchased this as a gift for my child and it worked fine for 1 1/2 month. And now it doesn’t work at all! I am very unhappy with this purchase and a little kid was very unhappy as well
customer_reviews.author: Ashley87

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: My wife fell of the board and fractured her wrist as she try to get off. Very bad design as no way to get off without quickly getting off. She lost her balance as she tried to get off. I can’t believe Amazon would let them sell this without any safety concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Shah

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, Wires Burned on First Use
customer_reviews.text: This hoverboard is dangerous. Wires started burning up during the first charge. My money was refunded after the return but I had to pay part of the return shipping cost. Don't buy this thing!
customer_reviews.author: tm628

customer_reviews.title: malfunction?
customer_reviews.text: i bought two of the same product at christmas. both have been used in the exact same locations under the exact same conditions. however, one of them is malfunctioning. it shows that the battery is dead (red light on the board) but when i plug it in, the light on the battery charger remains green. i tried resetting it and calibrating it several times. i have written the company looking for answers but have yet to hear anything back from them. this is infuriating. this is brand new at christmas and is making for a very frustrated little girl who loved riding on it. wish i could get someone to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old was thrilled with this Christmas gift. Within a day, he had pretty much mastered it. We had required him to wear a helmet any time it was in use but have added knee and elbow pads due to an early wipe out. The battery lasts a few hours and then needs several more hours to fully recharge, but I wasn’t expecting much else in terms of battery life. We got the white with multi colored lights and he loves the design. It’s sturdy and seems to be holding up well. Compared to some of the prices I found on line, this was incredibly well-priced and a good value for our money.
customer_reviews.author: Luajoy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these we ordered showed up damaged (shipping issue not seller), so this was a replacement. This was a Christmas gift for my teenage daughter. It worked well for about 2 months. Randomly it started just turning off while it was being ridden - as you can imagine this is a problem.. Thankfully nobody has been seriously injured. After another month, the stupid thing wouldn't even hold a charge for more than 2 minutes after being fully-charged. Major disappointment with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just got a dud? (Seller ROCKS!)
customer_reviews.text: ** Updated... Seller was amazing! Will buy again! Sent me a return label right away and refunded quickly! After my previous review we started having problems with one side of the board randomly not working. I've emailed the seller. Hoping they come thru with a solution. My daughter is heartbroken.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for her 7th birthday she had no problem learning how to do it! I was worried but she was quick to catch on and balancing seemed to be a breeze still uses a chair to hold on to while ahe steps off but i think that os more of a comfort thing! She loves the lights! I was very impressed by the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S.

customer_reviews.title: Get the protection plan!
customer_reviews.text: The Hoverboard worked great for about two months, then it started getting very erratic and would “spill” the rider with its jerkiness. I purchased the 3-year protection plan, so hopefully we get a replacement soon. The replacement plan company has a lot of “red tape,” so fingers crossed. I’ll update either way in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: carolingalong

customer_reviews.title: Good product but battery life is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product would have been a solid 5 star if battery life was better. My 10 year old weighs 80 lbs and it only lasts between 15 and 20 minutes when fully charged, even in the house on the smooth tile floor. At first we thought that our board was defective and requested a replacement, but replacement had the same issue. We decided to keep it, given the price and all the other good features (look, sturdiness, lights, speakers). My daughter likes it but I am kind of disappointed. This could have been an excellent product if they invested a little more in the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur-de-lis

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons 4 birthday, he caught onto it within a few hours. Everyone wants to ride on it my kids from ages 24-12, even my husband. It is made with quality material, keeps a charge and the Bluetooth is amazing, the lights light up with the music! Very entertaining for all ages would definitely recommend, worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Price of crap they won't let me return!!!
customer_reviews.text: We pulled this out of the box. Followed the instructions and it will not turn on. The battery is shot. I bought this for my daughter's birthday present. Apparently I bought it too soon because they now won't let me return in. I am livid. DO NOT BUY THIS!!!! YOU WILL GET BURNED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alright for the price!👍
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price & alright for a small child.. Doesn’t weigh as much as the more expensive brands & the lights seem to work fine.. Battery life isn’t too great compared to my daughters other hoverboard but should be able to get her through the summer.. Will more than likely pass on this brand if we plan on purchasing another hoverboard in the future.. Still a lot better choice compared to the crap Razors they sale at Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Snider

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 hour, doesn't charge
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She used it for maybe an hour, then plugged it in to charge. Woke up in the morning and the battery indicator seems to indicate full charge, but it just beeps. No amount of troubleshooting has gotten it to work again. Am going to attempt one exchange, then a full refund through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kuahara

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, fun little board
customer_reviews.text: White w/RGB Wheels Version: Bluetooth pairing is easy, speakers are decent - not very loud. Good range (roughly 35-40 ft) Wheels light up nicely, look really good in low light conditions. Board is stable, responsive, easy to control speeds & smooth. Our 7yr old has no trouble controlling speeds. Battery life seems a little low - not terrible but not really long lasting. Typical 7yr old weight w/lights going = about 30-35 minutes roughly. Took about 2 hours of practice to get it right & now she is zipping around having a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and very stable. Nice pink.good speakers
customer_reviews.text: Confused with all the bad reviews. I bought for my 10yr old daughter and she rides it like a charm Even I learnt it and its so easy to balance. Pink color and carbon print looks very nice. Make sure you read manual and calibrate it before first ride. We were also falling off when We tried to ride out of box. Once calibrated, you will realize how well it self balances. I need to try on pathway now. Charge time is pretty good and lasts for days. And it indeed has bluetooth. Just check your phone and you will see HOVERBOARD-HY. speakers are loud :)
customer_reviews.author: Sagsin

customer_reviews.title: This product only works for about three weeks then it goes all wonky
customer_reviews.text: My first one after three weeks just stopped working. We asked for a replacement they were kind enough to replace it. But now the new one started going backwards when ever you try to use it. I am Sorry to say but i will not be buying this product again
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first week or so. It wouldn’t charge at all... kept beeping and flashing red. On accident i figured out if you Press and Hold the power button till it beeps and flashes, it resets itself. Still a pain in the butt in my opinion. Wish I would have done more research on such an expensive toy. Will not buy again. Also the charge port come out very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Margerum

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I buy from this brand. Got for one kid and had to buy for my other kid (and I still have more kids in line waiting for theirs... :) This is super fun, easy to use. It takes a while for you to find your balance, but just a little practice you will be just fine. I think it is pretty safe but you have to wear safety gear (like with any other thing you ride) The battery has a very long life, which is great. They can play a lot and the we recharge it overnight so that the next day we are ready for more fun!!! I recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debora B

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS MODEL
customer_reviews.text: Read the FINE print!!! Warranty is only for 3 months and Amazon gives you 30 days after purchase! If you are still are considering buying this, look into the extended warranty! My daughter rode it in the house for about 3weeks on and off and it never worked again...now we’re stuck with it!! I would NOT recommend this hoverboard!!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieMay - South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, a great product. Takes a while to charge but everything works perfectly, charges good, performs as it should. Daughter is 9 and loves it! It's been raining so wondering how it does in real world but otherwise very pleased for what I've paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This machine broke my husband foot and landed. He has had surgery to get his ankle replaced . We would like to know who to contact to send a letter from Our lawyer
customer_reviews.author: ss1031

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The first day it was wonderful by the 4th day my daughter feel off because the Hoover board automatically shut down own it’s on, which it was fully charged. I had her put it down for a while the she can get back on. The shut down is not continuous it’s intermittent. I need someone to contact me regarding this problem fast. The board has nice features pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Stepping off of it was difficult because it detects that your one foot is still on the device and moves forward. Result- shattered wrist and thousands of dollars of medical bills. Get a scooter, instead.
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: Its a TOY
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that those little wheels will stop at every little bump and protrusion. My carpet cleaning romba goes does better than this hoverboard (granted it does have a weight of a 11 year old on it). My son enjoyed it a bit but there are very few places he can take it. You need near perfect surface to achieve that measly 6 mph speed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately; no costumer service.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons birthday; it worked for about 5 minutes before a wheel locked up and it wouldn’t run. We couldn’t even shut it off, so had to wait for the battery to die to charge it and try it again. Wheel locked every time after that, so decided to return it and get something else. But, customer service is horrid!!! Here I am almost a month later and they still haven’t issued my return. They have been in contact one time asking to to try something with the board, that didn’t work. Are they just waiting until the return period is over so they can refuse it?! Makes you wonder. Go with a different brand!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Straight

customer_reviews.title: Battery failed after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: It was fun until the battery failed one month after use. Waiting to see if manufacture replaces it. Now, 3 weeks later, they still haven't responded I won't buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Chatelain

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Well, my son got to enjoy this for all of about 20 minutes as the battery went low and needed to be recharged. He had tried recharging it for the specified amount of time. Immediately said the battery was low when he tried to use it and died within 30 seconds of riding it. Tried recharging overnight. Same result. I just spent $140 on something that never worked. I am super bummed and have no idea where to even try and take it to look at repair. Very bummed and upset. Waste for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Fineshriber

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Bluetooth, low battery life
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out by saying my daughter is OBSESSED with this. It is beautiful, the lights on it and the Bluetooth speaker really make this a huge hit. Even my uncoordinated self was able to quickly learn how to ride. It also goes pretty fast which is awesome! I am disappointed on the battery life. It doesn’t seem to last very long before needing to be recharged. Its also very easily scratched if it rolls into he ground which is very upsetting. Overall I am happy with the buy but I feel this is def a hoverboard you should buy for younger children and 1st time riders due to the cons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product, when it works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she had great fun using it for 3 days! After that, one of the wheels locked and the LED's on that side was blinking. The unit was not turning off. I tried to reset the unit using the on-off button. However, since the on-off button doesn't work, can not reset either.... Contacted to seller and no response. So, it is going back...
customer_reviews.author: Tez, LI

customer_reviews.title: This board looks nice but the battery only last about 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: This board looks nice but the battery only last about 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Holly Free

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time for Xmas (thank goodness) ! Got this for my 7yr old daughter as her gift from Santa, and when I opened up to charge battery I was pleasantly surprised at how heavy the board is. Seems to made very well, everything works flawlessly. The calibration sequence is simple and straightforward unlike many electronic components these days, and was as easy as turning on the switch and watching my daughter take off thru the house ! Well done !
customer_reviews.author: Kris D. Hay

customer_reviews.title: Wheels started locking up after 3 rides
customer_reviews.text: It was not a horrible product it was sturdy, light weight, looked nice. BUT the wheels started locking up and had to reset it like 3 to 4 times to get it to work again. I had to return it. Hopefully the distributor will stand by there word and refund my money. I will not be too happy at all if they don't. It cost to much money for 3 small 5 min rides and not to mention my 9yr old son is now heartbroken because I can not find another Orange one anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shana R.

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: Kinda lame. This board don't self balance before you stand on it. Motors are weak so braking is weak. The LED colors are lame, the way the wheel lites up is nothing the way the picture portrays. I bought it for my daughter's birthday, she is happy with it but has say it not as good as her brothers. I payed a little more for his board... guess I should've for hers to! Bottom line... pass, spend a couple like $50 more and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Lies
customer_reviews.text: Online it stated it was good for up to 260lbs but paperwork with it said 200, disappointed it was misrepresented, also said it goes 6mph and it only goes about 1mph which is ok but the child only weighs 40lbs anyone heavier it wont move. I thought the whole family could have fun on it but nope. If the info on it was correct I would have just ordered a different one. I feel we should be sent what I ordered not the cheap knockoff
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product states that can be ridden on grass and it cannot. My son weighs 130 and unless he gets this thing up to full speed, it wont even go over uneven sidewalks without tossing him off. Not impressed with the description of the item, as it does not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Find some other one..
customer_reviews.text: It was good for 1 week and now it doesn’t self balance anymore. Reset doesn’t help. My son is scared to get on it any more as it keeps shaking with out balancing. Return was not accepted and good that amazon gave refund.
customer_reviews.author: JKasu

customer_reviews.title: She’s happy but can’t ride on turf
customer_reviews.text: Update After it charged I reset it and it works. However unable to ride it on our turf. But works great now. My daughter is so disappointed! She rode it for 5 minutes and one of the wheels wouldn’t work and started to get super hot. Then the power on/off button wouldn’t work either. It eventually powered off after 7 more minutes. The battery life was 12 minutes the first time and then charged it again and only lasted 3 minutes and wheel locked again. Now waiting for seller to email be back so I can return.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica sterling

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than a week
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more of the reviews. We took it out of the box a week ago. My daughter can ride for about 5 minutes then it stops suddenly one one side shows as red or needing to be charged . If you put it back on the charger it shows as charged. I’ve read the instructions and tried to reset and recalibrate it. Nothing seems to work. I’m having the same issue as others. I should have kept the box a little longer so i could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dana K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life don’t waste your money like we did!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely waste of money!!! We charge the battery for no more then 4 hours like it says which it doesn’t take that long to charge only about 2 hours I keep an eye on it so I can take it off as soon as the light turns green and then within 10 mins it’s beeping because the battery is low and within 5 minutes it’s completely dead. I’ve never been so disappointed and dissatisfied in a product in my life! For how expensive they are you would think the kids would get a longer ride time out of it! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lesher

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service and Broke on day one
customer_reviews.text: This hoverboard was used once by a nine year old girl who was careful. It was not mishandled in any way. It was fun until one wheel seized up and so the board would only run in circles, and it overheated on the broken wheel side. Very disappointing, Even more disappointing and frustrating is that the seller has not responded to my contact. It has been 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: mummsie

customer_reviews.title: Non-functional due to manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturing error makes it unusable out of the box (after charged). One wheel is tight against the upper rail, not allowing the wheel to turn. Poor quality control by the manufacturer. That said, I ordered this because a friend has the model HY-A02 and it’s great. This is model HY-A02B. I’ll try ordering another one to see if it’s better. Worth a try for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBuckeye

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for 6 days and so far it's working great! It appears exactly as pictured by the seller. This was a Christmas present and when it arrived I took it out of the box to check it out and I noticed that it was fully charged and I didn't have to charge it, that was great.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: it does not work
customer_reviews.text: Hello! I bought a skateboard with you and I arrived in Venezuela yesterday, delay because it comes by boat, when I received it I put it up because my son was happy for his birthday gift. We wait 5 hours and it doesn't turn on. While it is plugged in it turns on, but when disconnected from the power it does not work. I appreciate your support in solving this problem. My email: jeanglas@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Jean J. Glas C

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: A month after Christmas and the hoverboard doesn’t work! Purchased for my 12 year old child. No physical damage it’s one side blinking red
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No fight left in me to go back and forth.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep charge at all and I requested a return, but in returned they asked me if I did certain things to make sure I wasn't the problem. Beeps constantly and they generously sent me a return label upon canceling the return because I knew it was going to be a huge hassle. I'm not willing to deal with right now. Just trying to keep my kids busy during these isolated times.
customer_reviews.author: marinchris

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of them. 2 out of the 3 were defective. The first one stopped taking a charge within a week and the second one kept malfunctioning on 1 side causing my daughter to almost break her neck. Ended up purchasing a 3 year protection plan for the third on as I’m sure it will fail too.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDad

customer_reviews.title: Not what it wus suppose to be
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 pink camouflage for the grand babies for Christmas and when they opened them they wus just pink and no led lights on the wheel wheels and no blue tooth speaker like the add said and when u buy from a third party amazon stick’s it right to u you always get stuck with product I got about 10 thangs I can’t even return
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Viviano

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift but ......................
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 12 year old son. He likes it, but it is hard to learn how to balance. it's fast and powerful upon standing. Must hold onto something at first. First time out, with helmet and long sleeved shirt and jeans on, my son stepped up on it and fell backwards and torn up his elbow. must be supervised and full body safety gear. would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Got a lemon so $120 down the drain
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had so much fun with the Hoverboard for a month and we can no longer charge it. The piece you plug into the hoverboard came loose and out so it no longer charges. I should have returned it when got it because it was never tight in the board from when we first got it but it was her birthday present. Too late for me to return it so $120 in the trash. Worked well when we could charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: We order this hover board for my 8 year old. It wouldn’t balance properly and she would just go in circles. She has had a different brand for about 4 years now and it gave up on us. I was hoping this hover board would work out but we have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Vikkie

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted seller and they were very responsive. They sent me a return label and refunded once item was shipped. Aside from the Bluetooth not working, it really is a good hover board! Bluetooth does not work. I’ve sent an email to seller and awaiting response. I’ll update review if resolved.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Wheels leave black residue on floors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! The only reason I’m giving 4 stars is because the wheels left a black residue on my carpet and wood flooring right after using so I knew it wasn’t from the wheels being dirty. She’s now only allowed to use this outside when originally it was purchased to only be used inside. Other than that it is a good product and the music plays great on it!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Good gift hope it last
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter really liked this, it took her one hour to learn how to ride it. The lights were a big hit. We’ve only had two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Kracynthia Gerald

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: First of all.... this product has absolutely the WORST battery life on the planet. I charged it for 4 hours and it lasts a mere 30 min before needing a charge again. Additionally, it started smelling like smoke as I began charging it the second time and we had to return it for fear of it burning the house down. I’ve had hoverboards a in the past and they were super fun and easy to ride, but this one would randomly shut down while riding it and tilt u backwards. The only positive is that the speakers are loud and the lights are pretty cool, however the Bluetooth rarely works and disconnects regularly while riding!
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Momma Feels Crushed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the hoverboard for the one ride my son got on it. The only thing he asked for for his 8th birthday. We charged it completely before he used it like instructions said and now it won’t turn back on after second charge. Of course we’re one day past the return eligibility date. I’m so crushed he couldn’t really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: AniQua Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Great product at slow price.
customer_reviews.text: Had to get one for my 13 year old granddaughter after I bought a slightly different model by the same supplier for her younger brother. Both have the same features, but different colors and lights, but this one was cost less. She loves it. And it will even hold this 225 lb grandfather who took it for a very slow and careful ride up and down their hallway yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Sisigad hooverboard
customer_reviews.text: Updated reviews. My 12 year old and he loves it and so my toddlers. After 3 months and a half of using charger went bad. No longer charges. At first it always had a green light although the hoverboard was dead now it shows no light color.
customer_reviews.author: Olga M.

customer_reviews.title: Stuttering
customer_reviews.text: So, idk if anyone else has experienced this or not. After about 2 minutes of riding, it starts to stutter and vibrate. Just about throws my daughter off. She’s 5 and about 40lbs. I got on it and rode it around (115lbs) and it didn’t seem to do this. Not sure if it’s a weight issue or what but definitely not good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay..wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the hoverboard as it is sturdy. She learned to use it quickly. I did contact the seller as where you charge the hoverboard comes out. Don’t think it should happen. Never hear back from the seller and it’s two late to return. So if you have the same issue return it as the seller is not responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Vnodoz

customer_reviews.title: Could be great but...the battery life stinks.
customer_reviews.text: Could be great but...the battery life stinks. Also, my daughter was riding it when one wheel locked up and she fell. It got really hot so we just let it sit for a while to cool off and tried again. It charges and works but now only works for about 10 minutes. It is really sad since she loves it. I have emailed the seller and am waiting the two business days for the reply. So we shall see what kind of customer service I get.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for 4days. So far it’s fine. Battery life seems okay. Works well on nice flat, smooth indoor surfaces. Wasn’t so great for outdoors and rugged sidewalks. This isn’t made for going up hills. Lmao you’ll roll back down. I’ll keep an update.
customer_reviews.author: PANCAKEUS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worth price!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my son.... a sensor stopped working within a week. Very cheap and not worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What is the white stuff on the bag?
customer_reviews.text: All seems pretty good so far. I will edit if opinion changes. But exactky what is this white stuff on the carry bag? This is for a kid who freaked out when she saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina W

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandaughter's birthday on Nov. 26th. By mid January the hoverboards electronics/sensors stopped working. The hoverboard can now only go one direction and the lights flash and it beeps when she tries to use it. And of course the window for return is now closed. So I spent $125 on something she enjoyed for a month and a half, now it's just junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: About to buy another one for my son. My daughter got hers for Christmas and they’ve basically been sharing it I love how it plays music it’s so funny to watch them “dance” on this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Rheanne

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: We initially liked the hover board. After having for 2 months it has stopped charging. I reached out to the seller two times for help and to inquire about the warranty (stated for 3 months). I have not heard anything back and am very frustrated. I would choose a different hoverboard if you are shopping for one.
customer_reviews.author: RNMommy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my 9 year old, and she absolutely loves it! It was easy to calibrate and connect to my phone via Bluetooth. She loves riding it and playing her music on it. The product looks and feels of good quality and does everything they advertised. We are very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiru Khanna

customer_reviews.title: Made a great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if our 6 year old would be able to handle the hoverboard, but he learned pretty quickly and started riding it around the apartments in the first 5 minutes. The board itself works great, the lights make it look pretty cool in the dark. The battery lasts I think up to an hour, Bluetooth works fine as well. Overall, pretty happy with it, inexpensive but so far no complaints at all, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Texas_LongHorn

customer_reviews.title: Lights on one side is off already after two months
customer_reviews.text: My kids definitely like this one, and then I got the other one for my little. but the problem is the lights on one side just suddenly stopped working, it just flashes on one side, my kids is a little bit disappointed. I will give a try one more time and hope it's a random issue.
customer_reviews.author: YZ

customer_reviews.title: Battery keeps beeping as low n red for no reason or when ever picked up some speed
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoyed riding it for first week only, and then it started beeping very frequently for no reason even if its charged full. one observation made was it definitely beeps when tried to pick up speed. i bought it to use indoors in these lockdown times and even this is not great for indoor use itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Search others would not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old daughter for Christmas. Well her I am at Jan 15 and not working. She only road it in door on our hardwood floors. Within 3 weeks the right wheel starting jerking and it would move. I did try to a calibration - nope. I did buy the protection plan and Asurion was wonderful to work with, already got my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.text: The charging port on the hoverboard broke after a couple months of use. Also, the side panel of the wheel came off after just a few uses. I would not recommend this product to other buyers. I purchased a GoTrax hoverboard six months before this one and I haven’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold a charge!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this hover board for less than one year. It has had issues from the beginning. Looking back, I wish I would have returned it. At first, my daughter would get about 10 minutes from a full charge. Now she gets about one minute. Wish I could still rerun this.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis E. Wolbert

customer_reviews.title: Sisigad Hover Board
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as Christmas gift for 16 year old. Did not work properly. Contacted seller and they responded quickly, with instructions how to recalibrate. Easy, peasy to do and now works perfectly !! If I had scrolled down on the info page for this item the instructions were right there for recalibration. Only negative is length of time the child can use it after charged. Maybe 20-25 minutes at most. Best used on a smooth surface.
customer_reviews.author: Candyce P. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: These honestly work well. Used by child who only weighs 50 pounds so I am sure that helps. Surprisingly good battery life. 7 year old learned very quickly. After using a few times seems very comfortable. Just realize these things will get major scratched up if used on the road. They are definitely subjected to some rough tumbles but aside from scratches it hasn’t had any problems in 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: B. Macsata

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my 9 yrs old and 8 yrs grandkids. The user's manual is a minimalist two-page paper with limited info. After fully charging, my grandson's board stopped working completely after a half hour of use even though the unit was still charged. My granddaughter's unit had a different issue and stopped working the next day, one wheel would not turn. No info in the limited user's manual on how to fix, no customer service available. Returning both units.
customer_reviews.author: Carol 57

customer_reviews.title: Like others, the wheel locked and now it won't work.
customer_reviews.text: My son worked for weeks to earn money to buy a hoverboard, so we read all the reviews we could find and 'supposedly' this one was great. So we bought this one and two days after receiving it the wheel locked and will not function any longer. Needless to say we're not happy about this turn of events. Requested a refund and we'll see what their customer service does.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Moon

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for less than 3 weeks and it has already stopped working. The one side just stops randomly. Then today, the hoverboard while off started heating up and started to smell like burning rubber. I can’t even imagine if I didn’t catch this on time. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Kaczor

customer_reviews.title: Learn from my mistake , try it on As soon as it arrives  .
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective hoverboard, I order it 2 months ago for a special event and didn’t open it untill recently to found out there was a orange flashing light when charging it which means the internal battery needs to be changed and I can’t even return it bcus of how late I found out about the issue smh now I’m stuck with a broken product pretty disappointed at the hoverboard and at myself for not finding out about it sooner
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Six year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My six year old son loves this hoverboard. We had previously bought one off amazon for double the price and had to return it due to one of the wheels not working properly. This one is so much easier to balance for him. He rides it all through the house, and it stay charged for most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Allred

product_meta.title: SISIGAD Hoverboard Self Balancing Scooter 6.5" Two-Wheel Self Balancing Hoverboard with Bluetooth Speaker and LED Lights Electric Scooter for Adult Kids Gift UL 2272 Certified - Pure Color Series
product_meta.description:
Warranty(from the date of purchase): 
3 Months Warranty
30 Days Money Back

Specification:
Motor: Dual Hub Motors
Battery Type: Lithium high-rate 5C battery
Charging Time: 3-5 Hours
Using Time: 30-60 Minutes
Riding Range: 6 Miles
Weight-bearing: 44lb to 200 lb
Max Climbing Angle: 10 Degree
Wheel size: 6.5"" Tire
Net Weight: 20 lb/ 9 Kg

Package Contains:
1 x Two-Wheels Hoverboard
1 x Power Supply Charger
1 x Manual

NOTES:
▶Please fully charge before using for the first time. Pull the plug after charging to avoid overcharging.
▶Remember that the range of motion should not be too large, as far as possible to avoid excessive tilt.
▶Children should be accompanied under the guardianship of an adult, and the speed should not be too fast.
▶DO NOT swerve at high speed.
▶DO NOT start or stop operation on a slope, as to avoid damaging the self-balacning system or causing function errors.
▶DO NOT operate the hoverboard when the ""BATTERY LOW"" indicator on.

STEPS TO CONNECT BLUETOOTH:
1.Turn on your phone's bluetooth; 
2.Start the hoverboard; 
3.Find the corresponding device which named as ""Bluetooth"" and click connect. 
You will hear a sound like ""Ding-dong"" from the hoverbaord. 
Then you can open the music app and enjoy music. And the volume can be changed by adjusting the volume of your phone. 

HOW TO RESET:
1. Turn off your hoverboard.
2. Place your hoverboard on the ground, make sure your hoverboard is not tilting in any direction and calibrate balance in a horizontal level.
3. Hold down the power button for at least 20 seconds.
4. Power off the hoverboard and turn it back on. 
Please try resetting your hoverboard again if the first attempt did not solve the issue.
feature_bullets: ▶▶SHIPPED FROM US. - All SISIGAD hoverboards have passed strict electrical test and meet UL2272 standards to ensure safety. Any issue just feel free to contact us.
▶▶UNIQUE LED & BLUETOOTH - Built-in wireless speaker can be easily connected to portable devices in second, just enjoy your favorite music or books without wearing headphones.
▶▶SELF BALANCING CONTROL SYSTEM - Full of technology and easy to learn for beginners and amateurs. Li-ion batteries, dual hub motors, quick charging and longer using time.
▶▶SMOOTH RIDES - 6.5" wheels with high quality rubber tires and comfortable footpedals, provide smooth riding experience.
▶▶PERFECT GIFT - Specially designed for beginners, amateurs, office workers, dog and cat walkers, free your feet - new way for transportation! So have fun with your family and friends!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
